00054         enum PassType
00055         {
00056             PT_CLEAR,           // Clear target to one colour
00057             PT_STENCIL,         // Set stencil operation
00058             PT_RENDERSCENE,     // Render the scene or part of it
00059             PT_RENDERQUAD,      // Render a full screen quad
00060             PT_RENDERCUSTOM     // Render a custom sequence
00061         };
